message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm interested in this product, but I can only offer $850,000. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
